data.name: SpacePOM
data.detailed_description:
Join a plucky Pomerainain’s rocket-propelled adventures through a derelict starship! Using only wits (and a standard issue BK-39 jetpack), SpacePOM must dodge hazards, collect items, and perform repairs to find out what caused the disappearance of the ship’s canine crew.

The Story So Far

It has been 30 years since the starship Halen left on its historic mission to find the source of a mysterious deep space transmission. Now the ship has suddenly returned to Earth’s orbit, clearly damaged and working only on reserve power. After several days without any communication from the crew, the Bureau for Astronomical Research and Cartography (BARC) decides they must send an investigator.


SpacePOM, a private contractor, has been hired by BARC to look for answers in the silent ship. With luck SpacePOM can discover why it disappeared for so long, what caused the damage, and what may be hiding in the shadows…

Key Features

  • Play as a heroic dog
  • Explore an abandoned spaceship
  • Boost your way past dangerous obstacles
  • Solve complex puzzles
  • Snoop through crew emails
  • Eat dog treats in dozens of flavors

data.short_description: Join space-faring Pomeranian SpacePOM on a mission to investigate a derelict spaceship. Using only your trusty jetpack and toolbox, make your way through the spaceship Halen in this sci-fi platformer and find answers along the way.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 926 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 680 / AMD HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 926 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870
  • Storage: 926 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 680 / AMD HD 7970
  • Storage: 926 MB available space

highlighted.name: To The Moon, For All I Care!
